column5: Upstairs unit of this centrally located, upgraded, historic home is the ABSOLUTE best! The space is so comfy & homey, you may not even want to get out! We are located just off a main road that goes into the downtown area, less than two miles from the famous Pearl scene with music, eats, coffee and drinks! Also less than a mile, just a mere four blocks out from a main \
column8: PERFECT location, close to the Pearl & downtown!!
